commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, FOUR runsa 30-run over! Slogged to deep midwicket, and there's a chance of a catch, but the ball falls just short of the fielding running in, and squirts behind him for four more. Gaikwad unbeaten on 123, India finish on 222
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, FOUR, India finish with 222/3 in 20 overs! Gaikwad spanks this over deep mid-wicket and the fielder sprinting across only manages to get his hands to it, can't grab the ball though and India finish on a high

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad,  SIX runsshort ball on middle and off. Gaikwad stays in his crease and pummels a six over wide long on!
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, SIX, stays put and clubs this floated delivery over long-on for six more. Maxwell has no answers to this onslaught by Gaikwad

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad,  SIX runspumped! Full ball, Gaikwad gives him the charge, and then sends the six over long on!
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, SIX, shimmies down the wicket and smokes this floated delivery over long-on for a maximum more. Insane hitting

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad,  SIX runspumped! Full ball, Gaikwad gives him the charge, and then sends the six over long on!
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, wide, fired down the leg-side, it's a wide ball

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, 1 widefull ball around leg. Attempts the sweep, misses. Wade not happy. Was there some touch?
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, SIX, shimmies down the wicket and smokes this floated delivery over long-on for a maximum more. Insane hitting

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, 1 widefull ball around leg. Attempts the sweep, misses. Wade not happy. Was there some touch?
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, wide, fired down the leg-side, it's a wide ball

commentary: Maxwell to Tilak Varma,  1 runoff the pad to the leg side for one
second_commentary: Maxwell to Tilak Varma, 1 run, off an inside edge and off the pads towards the leg-side

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad,  1 runstruck to deep midwicket
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, 1 run, into the slot and Gaikwad has heaved this towards deep mid-wicket on the bounce

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad,  1 runstruck to deep midwicket
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, no ball, FOUR, smashes this floated delivery right over the bowler's head and manages to beat long-off, but Maxwell has overstepped. Free-hit coming up!

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, (no ball) FOUR runshe's overstepped too!
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, 1 run, into the slot and Gaikwad has heaved this towards deep mid-wicket on the bounce

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, (no ball) FOUR runshe's overstepped too!
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, no ball, FOUR, smashes this floated delivery right over the bowler's head and manages to beat long-off, but Maxwell has overstepped. Free-hit coming up!

commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad,  SIX runsthere's the hundred! Fullish ball. Steps forward and then muscles a shot over wide long on! That's hundred in 52 balls. Crazy accelerationSee all photos
second_commentary: Maxwell to Gaikwad, SIX, maiden T20I century for Gaikwad! What a special moment as he takes off the helmet and celebrates it in style. Has a wide smile on his face too. Brings it up with a maximum over deep mid-wicket and Tilak walks up to him and congratulates him. Not for the first time have we seen him play such a knock. Has done this on several previous occasions in India's domestic circuit and in the Indian Premier League..

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  2 runsshort ball. He moves to the off side and plays a paddle over his shoulder past Wade for a couple
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 2 runs, slashed over cover as it's a widish delivery, but it lands just in front of the fielder who was charging in from the deep

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, FOUR runsshort ball. Waits for it, then pulls behind square, and its one-bounce four!
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, FOUR, runs coming thick and fast from both the ends! A short ball by Nathan Ellis and Tilak Varma swivel-pulls this towards deep square leg as the ball almost goes the distance

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  2 runsshort of length ball on middle. Tilak spots the slower ball and paddles it over Wade's head
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 2 runs, scoops this short ball over the keeper's head for a couple of runs. Couldn't really middle it as there wasn't much pace on offer

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, no runshort ball, attempts the pull. Misses it after losing his shape
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, no run, slower bouncer outside off, Tilak Varma swings and misses, got deceived due to the lack of pace

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad,  1 runfull ball just outside off. Guided to deep backward point
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, 1 run, opens the bat face and slices this towards backward point for one

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  1 runfull ball on middle. Can't get underneath it very well. Hit to wide long on
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 run, good field placement as Tilak Varma whips it towards deep mid-wicket, nothing more than a single though

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  1 runfull ball on middle. Can't get underneath it very well. Hit to wide long on
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, wide, fired outside off, Tilak Varma can't reach for it, back-to-back wides

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  1 runfull ball on middle. Can't get underneath it very well. Hit to wide long on
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, wide, starts off with a wide, goes slow, but misses the tramline outside off

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull and wide again. They collect the extra again
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 run, good field placement as Tilak Varma whips it towards deep mid-wicket, nothing more than a single though

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull and wide again. They collect the extra again
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, wide, fired outside off, Tilak Varma can't reach for it, back-to-back wides

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull and wide again. They collect the extra again
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, wide, starts off with a wide, goes slow, but misses the tramline outside off

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull and wide outside off. Left alone. That's the hundred partnership with Tilak's contribution 21
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 run, good field placement as Tilak Varma whips it towards deep mid-wicket, nothing more than a single though

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull and wide outside off. Left alone. That's the hundred partnership with Tilak's contribution 21
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, wide, fired outside off, Tilak Varma can't reach for it, back-to-back wides

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull and wide outside off. Left alone. That's the hundred partnership with Tilak's contribution 21
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, wide, starts off with a wide, goes slow, but misses the tramline outside off

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  2 runsfull and wide ball outside off again. Gaikwad moves off side to repeat the previous shot. Hit to deep square leg this time and the fielder cuts it off. 25 runs off the over!
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 2 runs, 25 runs from the over! Gaikwad goes down on his knee and swipes this towards deep mid-wicket, but the fielder stationed near the fence sprints across and stops it

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  SIX runsfull ball wider outside off. Gaikwad wears his Suryakumar mask, moves to the off side and plays a flick nonchalantly over fine leg! Into the nineties
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, SIX, excellent batting! Walks across in the crease and swipes this overpitched delivery over deep backward square leg. Into the 90s now!

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, no runno run this time
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, no run, looks to play across, but Hardie goes full and wide outside off

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR runsfull ball around off. Gaikwad is seeing 'em like watermelons and thumps a shot down the V to long-on for four more!
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR, add four more to it. Hardie is proving to be really expensive in his last over. Goes full again and Gaikwad lofts it over the bowler's head and the lightning quick outfield is enough to fetch him a boundary. Plenty of changes in the field following that as the bowler seems to be under tremendous pressure

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  SIX runsshort ball outside off. Gaikwad pre-empts it, moves to the off side, gets in line for a pull, and sends the ball over the deep midwicket boundary!
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, SIX, short and punished! Gets hold of this loosener and thumps it over deep mid-wicket for the second maximum of the over

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  SIX runsshort ball outside off. Gaikwad pre-empts it, moves to the off side, gets in line for a pull, and sends the ball over the deep midwicket boundary!
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, Hardie goes wide outside off and it's missed the tramline. Wade wants a review for a wide, but it's not available in this format

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull ball, wide outside the tram-lines. Misses
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, SIX, short and punished! Gets hold of this loosener and thumps it over deep mid-wicket for the second maximum of the over

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull ball, wide outside the tram-lines. Misses
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, Hardie goes wide outside off and it's missed the tramline. Wade wants a review for a wide, but it's not available in this format

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  SIX runsgoing, going, gone! Slot ball just outside off, and Gaikwad deposits it over the bowler's head!
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, SIX, spanked! Hardie goes full and straight outside off, Gaikwad stands tall and lofts it over long-off for a clean six. No need to run for those

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad,  1 runan epic spell from Behrendorff - 1-12 in four overs with 17 dots. Ends the spell with a yorker on leg that's dug away
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, 1 run, end of a fantastic spell by Behrendorff. Can well prove to be a match defining one. Right into the blockhole and Gaikwad can only manage to dig it towards deep mid-on. A single to end Behrendorff's spell: 4-1-12-1

commentary: Behrendorff to Tilak Varma,  1 runfull ball on middle. Slower one again. Tilak loads up for a big shot but mistimes to short fine
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Tilak Varma, 1 run, 111 kph, Tilak Varma swings across the line, gets an inside edge on to the pads. The ball rolls towards the leg-side for a single

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad,  1 runlength ball on leg. Gaikwad wanted to go over cover after spotting no fielder on the boundary line in that region. But can only bunt it to cover
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, 1 run, back to a quicker delivery, Gaikwad gets a leading edge towards mid-off as he tries to play this across the line

commentary: Behrendorff to Tilak Varma,  1 runpace off again.  Full just outside off. Mistimed drive past the bowler for a single
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Tilak Varma, 1 run, another slower one around off, Tilak Varma eases it towards mid-off for one

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad,  1 rungood length ball pulled to cow corner
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, 1 run, Behrendorff goes short and slow, Gaikwad pulls this through the on-side for a single

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad,  2 runslength ball at only 116kph. Pulled to the leg side for a couple more
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, 2 runs, 150 up for India! A length delivery by Behrendorff and Gaikwad heaves it through the leg-side for a couple of runs

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad,  1 runshort ball outside off. Dragged to wide long on. Just five off the over
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, 1 run, short of a length around middle and leg, Gaikwad drags it towards deep mid-wicket for a single

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  1 runshort ball on leg. Mistimed pull high in the air but lands short of deep fine leg
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 run, short and quick on middle and leg, Tilak Varma goes for the pull, miscues it towards deep square leg for one

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma, no runwell disguised slower ball. Short and Tilak was through the pull way too early
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, no run, slower short ball outside off, Tilak Varma swings and misses

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad,  1 runfull ball just outside off. Muscled to long on
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, 1 run, full and straight at the stumps, Gaikwad heaves this towards wide long-on for one

commentary: Ellis to Tilak Varma,  1 runslower ball again. Length on off. Fended with soft hands after a late adjustment from Tilak
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Tilak Varma, 1 run, slower short ball outside off, Tilak Varma chops it towards gully for a single

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad,  1 runlength ball on middle. Tucked to midwicket. Slower one to start off, only 107kph
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, 1 run, slower delivery on middle and leg, Gaikwad works this through mid-wicket for one

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma, no runoverpitched outside off. Pokes at it. Misses. Sangha 0-42 tonight
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, no run, fired outside off, Tilak Varma has a poke at it and almost nicks it behind

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma, no runlength ball on middle and off. Fended back
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, no run, spins in sharply, Tilak Varma stays rooted in the crease and knocks this back to Sangha

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad,  1 rundriven for a single to the off side
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, 1 run, tad short outside off, Gaikwad carves this through the off-side for one

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad,  SIX runsOMG! Full ball outside off. Gaikwad takes a big stride in and lofts an inside out six over cover! Terrific
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, SIX, goes inside out and lofts this nonchalantly over deep extra cover for half-a-dozen. This is Gaikwad's hightest score in T20Is

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR runsfull ball around leg and swept hard behind square! No stopping that
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR, swept away! Floated on middle and leg, Gaikwad goes down on his knee and sweeps it past short fine leg for four more

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad, no runlength ball just outside off. Cut behind to short third
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, no run, tad short outside off, Gaikwad cuts it towards the fielder at point

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, FOUR runsHashtag Like a Tracer Bullet. Clubbed to deep backward square leg for a boundary. Length ball angling into his hips, and Tilak swiveled early to get in position
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, FOUR, 50-run stand up! Tilak Varma was backing away to play this, but Hardie follows him down the leg-side. Tilak Varma adjusts well and drags it past the man at short fine and that shall be 19 runs from the over

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, FOUR runsHashtag Like a Tracer Bullet. Clubbed to deep backward square leg for a boundary. Length ball angling into his hips, and Tilak swiveled early to get in position
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, wide, banged in short by Hardie, Tilak Varma goes for the hook, but misses. Called an overhead wide this time around

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, 1 wideshort ball around leg. Attempts the hook, misses, but that's OK. Wide given for height
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, FOUR, 50-run stand up! Tilak Varma was backing away to play this, but Hardie follows him down the leg-side. Tilak Varma adjusts well and drags it past the man at short fine and that shall be 19 runs from the over

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, 1 wideshort ball around leg. Attempts the hook, misses, but that's OK. Wide given for height
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, wide, banged in short by Hardie, Tilak Varma goes for the hook, but misses. Called an overhead wide this time around

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  1 runfull ball wider outside off. Driven to deep backward point
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 run, opens the bat face and steers this short of a length delivery to third man for one

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR runsbit of a nothing ball and Gaikwad punishes this with a pull. Slower ball, short and wide, and Gaikwad drags a pull to cow corner. His fourth T20I fifty! And back-to-back ofcourse.
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR, fifty for Gaikwad! Hardie goes short and the opener nails his pull through mid-wicket to bring up the milestone. Raises his bat to acknowledge the crowd. Another solid knock by him

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR runsbit of a nothing ball and Gaikwad punishes this with a pull. Slower ball, short and wide, and Gaikwad drags a pull to cow corner. His fourth T20I fifty! And back-to-back ofcourse.
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, back-to-back wides, another one well outside off

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR runsbit of a nothing ball and Gaikwad punishes this with a pull. Slower ball, short and wide, and Gaikwad drags a pull to cow corner. His fourth T20I fifty! And back-to-back ofcourse.
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, goes for the wide yorker but misses the tramline

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull and wide outside off stump. Left alone again to take the wide
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR, fifty for Gaikwad! Hardie goes short and the opener nails his pull through mid-wicket to bring up the milestone. Raises his bat to acknowledge the crowd. Another solid knock by him

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull and wide outside off stump. Left alone again to take the wide
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, back-to-back wides, another one well outside off

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull and wide outside off stump. Left alone again to take the wide
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, goes for the wide yorker but misses the tramline

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull and wide. Beyond the tram-lines. No shot offered
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR, fifty for Gaikwad! Hardie goes short and the opener nails his pull through mid-wicket to bring up the milestone. Raises his bat to acknowledge the crowd. Another solid knock by him

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull and wide. Beyond the tram-lines. No shot offered
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, back-to-back wides, another one well outside off

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 widefull and wide. Beyond the tram-lines. No shot offered
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, wide, goes for the wide yorker but misses the tramline

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR runsfull and wide ball. Driven away from his body and slapped past the running deep point fielder! He's accelerated and how!
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR, width on offer, Gaikwad pounces on it and crunches it through cover-point for a rollicking boundary

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  2 runslength ball punched to the midwicket region for a couple
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 2 runs, decent running between the wickets, Gaikwad clips this through mid-wicket for a couple of runs

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma,  1 runshort of length ball around leg stump. Pulled to fine leg
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, 1 run, 129.6kph, short one at the hips, Tilak Varma swivel-pulls this to fine leg for a single

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR runsshort of length on off. Turning away. Easy pickings for Ruturaj, who stays on the back foot and cuts over cover!
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR, back-to-back boundaries for Gaikwad - another half-tracker from Sangha, short and wide of off, Gaikwad backs away and then slaps it over cover for another boundary, 12 off the over

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR runslength ball around off. Gaikwad stays in his crease, fronts up his stance, and then thumps a pull between long on and deep midwicket!
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR, clubbed, a half-tracker from Sangha - Gaikwad rocks back and then hammers the pull over mid-wicket, one bounce and over the ropes

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma,  1 runfull ball on middle. Clipped off the back foot to the leg side
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, 1 run, tossed up on off, worked in front of square on the on-side for a single

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma,  1 runfull ball on middle. Clipped off the back foot to the leg side
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, wide, pushed through with a seam-up action, but it's past the tramlines and is called as a wide

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull ball, quite wide outside off. Lets it go
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, 1 run, tossed up on off, worked in front of square on the on-side for a single

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma, 1 widefull ball, quite wide outside off. Lets it go
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, wide, pushed through with a seam-up action, but it's past the tramlines and is called as a wide

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma, no runfull ball outside off. Guided to backward point
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, no run, tossed up well wide of off, sliced away straight to the fielder at backward point

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad,  1 runplayed to deep midwicket
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, 1 run, flighted delivery on middle and leg, worked down to long-on for a single

commentary: T Sangha to Tilak Varma,  1 rungood length ball on middle. Turning into leg. Pulled to deep backward square leg
second_commentary: Sangha to Tilak Varma, 1 run, tossed up on middle and leg, pulled away behind square on the on-side for a single

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, FOUR runsshort of length, just outside off, Ruturaj rides the bounce and cuts it behind square for four more! Three boundaries in that over
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, FOUR, lovely, short and wide of off, Gaikwad gets on top of the bounce and then crunches it square past point, races away to the ropes

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, no runfullish ball outside off. Slapped to point
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, no run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, Gaikwad picks out backward point with the cut

commentary: Kane Richardson to Tilak Varma,  1 runlength ball just outside off. Angling across. Gets a bit of bat to it and guides it to deep third
second_commentary: K Richardson to Tilak Varma, 1 run, back of a length and angling across the left-hander, Varma runs it down towards third man

commentary: Kane Richardson to Tilak Varma, FOUR runsoverpitched, wider outside off. TIlak leans forward and crunches a square drive beautifully to beat deep extra cover!
second_commentary: K Richardson to Tilak Varma, FOUR, slapped, width on offer from Richardson - Varma leans across, opens the face of the bat and then slices the drive square past point, races away to the ropes in a hurry

commentary: Kane Richardson to Tilak Varma, no runlength ball on middle and off. Defended
second_commentary: K Richardson to Tilak Varma, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, defended back at the bowler

commentary: Kane Richardson to Tilak Varma, FOUR runsgood length ball angling into him. Makes a solid base by planting his feet wide and then pulls to fine leg!
second_commentary: K Richardson to Tilak Varma, FOUR, that's easy pickings for Tilak Varma - back of a length and well down leg, the left-hander swivels across and pulls it over long leg, who was inside the ring - almost went all the way, bouncing in front of the ropes

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR runsshort ball around off. Pulled, and this time with much more power! Finds the gap at deep backward square leg
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, FOUR, beautifully played, another slower short ball from Hardie, but this one sat up to be smacked - Gaikwad swivelled across, rode the bounce and then pulled it over square leg for a boundary

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  2 runsslower ball pulled to deep backward square leg this time
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 2 runs, the slower short ball from Hardie, Gaikwad had to wait on it as he swivelled into the pull, picks the gap behind square on the on-side and he's back for the second

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma,  1 run
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, 1 run, back of a length and well wide of off, steered square on the off-side for a single

commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, no rungood length ball around off, from around the stumps. Fended
second_commentary: Hardie to Tilak Varma, no run, short of a good length and angling across the left-hander, defended to the off-side

commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar, OUTHardie with the big one! Short of length ball around off stump. Suryakumar attempts to get slightly low and paddle it over his shoulder in an unconventional way. Gets the outside edge and Wade collects to his right.Suryakumar Yadav c †Wade b Hardie 39 (29b 5x4 2x6 34m) SR: 134.48See all photos
second_commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar Yadav, out Caught by Wade!! Edged and caught! A big wicket and Hardie has broken through - shortened the length on this slower ball and hit the deck hard, Suryakumar swivelled across and then swung, but he swung early, was through with the shot and the ball caught a big edge on its way to the keeper. Wade throws the ball in delight and India have lost their captain. Suryakumar Yadav c Wade b Hardie 39(29) [4s-5 6s-2]

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  1 runcut to the deep for a single
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, drilled to deep cover for a single

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar, no runfull ball wide outside off. Reaches out, mistimes a shot. Gaikwad turns down a prospective single. Drinks with India 80/2
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, Suryakumar reaches out and gets an inside edge on the drive, the ball drops to the off-side and he wanted a single, but his partner ain't interested

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad,  1 runback of length delivery around off. Tucked to the leg side for a single
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, 1 run, short of a length and at the stumps, nudged through mid-wicket for a single

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad, no runshort ball just outside off. He's too quick into the pull with Ellis bowling a slower ball (117kph). Bottom-edged onto the deck
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, no run, another slower short ball outside off - Gaikwad was early into the pull and drags an inside edge onto his pad

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar,  1 runfullish ball outside off. Bottom-edges a cut to short third and they scurry across for one. Direct-hit, but they're safe
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, slower short ball outside off, Suryakumar chops an under-edge to short third man and they're off for a quick single

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar, FOUR runsfull ball on middle and leg. Brilliant straight drive past Gaikwad, and mid-on's slide across the grass is in vain too!
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, FOUR, creamed, full and at the stumps, Suryakumar leans forward, presents the full face of the bat and then caresses the drive between the non-striker and the umpire, beating mid-on's dive to his left

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar, no rungood length ball just outside off. Tries the cut. Misses
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, on a good length and angling across the right-hander, Suryakumar has a poke at that and missed

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad,  2 runsmuscles this fullish ball to wide long on. Fifty stand!
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, 2 runs, Sangha dragged the length back on off, pulled away to the right of long-on and the two batters scamper back for the second

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR runsfull ball outside off. Bit of turn away. Skips down the ground and caresses a four through the covers. Exquisite shot
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, FOUR, cracking shot, Gaikwad comes down the pitch, makes room and then plays a sublime drive, finds the gap past cover anbd the fast outfield does the rest

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad, no rungood length ball outside off. Cut to point
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, no run, flatter and just outside off, punched off the back-foot to backward point

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar,  1 rungood length ball outside off. Cut to the deep
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, short and spinning away from wide of off, cut square past cover-point for a single

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar, no runfull ball on middle and leg. Tucked with the turn to the off side
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, Sangha drags the length back on off, pushed off the back-foot to cover

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad,  1 rundriven down the ground and Maxwell slides around at long on to stop the four
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, 1 run, tossed up on middle and leg, driven down towards long-on for a single

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  1 runfullish ball, fifth-stump line. Punched to mid off for a single
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 run, fuller length delivery outside off, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off for a quick single

commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar,  1 runfull and wide. Slices a loft over the off side. Well short of Maxwell at deep point
second_commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, short of a good length and well wide of off, Suryakumar slices the drive over cover-point, on the bounce to the fielder in the deep

commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar, FOUR runsplaced between fine leg and deep square leg! Suryakumar picks this length ball off his hip and gently guides it with the swinging bat behind square.
second_commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar Yadav, FOUR, back-to-back boundaries now, short and at the stumps - Suryakumar swivels across and then pulls it over square leg, two men in the deep and he bisected them to perfection

commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar, FOUR runslength ball outside off. Plays a dangerous square drive, but gets it past point who was the only catching fielder for that shot!
second_commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar Yadav, FOUR, typical Suryakumar shot, width on offer and he then flays the drive wide of point - the feet hardly moved, but he did open the face of the bat and found the gap square past point

commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad,  1 rungood length ball bit wide outside off. Pulled to wide long on. For those unfamiliar with Hardie, he loads up like Moises Henriques with the ball, but faster
second_commentary: Hardie to Gaikwad, 1 run, back of a length and just outside off, muscled down to long-on for a single

commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar,  1 runa single off the first ball
second_commentary: Hardie to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, Suryakumar reached out on the drive and gets an under-edge that rolls past the keeper

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar,  1 runfull ball on middle. Driven with the turn to the off side
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, tossed up on off, pushed into the gap wide of cover for a single - 11 off the over

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar, FOUR runsgood length ball around off. Bit of extra bounce.  SKY tries to cut but ends up slicing it past the vacant slip region! Fifty for India
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, FOUR, nicely played, pushed through quicker and just outside off - Suryakumar backs away on the cut, gets a fine edge and the ball races away through the vacant slip region

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar, no runterrific ball. Classical legspinner's ball. Fullish ball just outside off, grips after pitching, turns away and SKY misses the drive.
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, beautifully bowled, a lovely leg-break from Sangha - drifts in and spins away, teasing Suryakumar on the drive and beating him on the outside edge

commentary: T Sangha to Gaikwad,  1 rungood length ball outside off. Turning away. Cut to deep point
second_commentary: Sangha to Gaikwad, 1 run, dropped short and wide of off, cut away square on the off-side for a single

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar,  1 runfull ball just outside off. Attempts a drive. Inside edged to short fine leg
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, much better from Sangha, was the attempted wrong 'un, slid on straight and catches Suryakumar's inside edge on the drive, a single behind square on the on-side

commentary: T Sangha to Suryakumar, FOUR runspoor, poor ball. Tossed up full outside leg. SKY gets low to sweep, and sweeps well enough!
second_commentary: Sangha to Suryakumar Yadav, FOUR, poor start from Sangha, full-toss wide down leg, all Suryakumar needs to do is to get some bat on the sweep, he does so and sends it fine, beating the fielder in the ring

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no runfull ball on off. Plays the straight drive but the ball holds its line and goes past the inside edge to Wade. Awfully close to off stump as well! Gaikwad survives a close one and that's the powerplay wrapped
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no run, beaten, on a good length and holding its line outside off - draws Gaikwad into an extravagant drive and beats him on the inside edge, wasn't too far away from the off-stump as well

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no runfull ball on off stump. Opens the bat's face and plays to cover
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no run, slower cutter outside off, driven straight to the fielder at cover

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no runlength ball on middle with some extra bounce as the ball angles across. He mistimes a pull and drags it to mid on
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, Gaikwad swivels across and finds mid-on with the flat-batted pull

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, FOUR runsfull ball on middle and off. A controlled-front foot drive that goes between SKY and mid off!
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, FOUR, lovely, tad too full from Behrendorff, Gaikwad leans forward, presents the full face of the bat and then punches it straight past the non-striker, no need to run for those

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no rungood length ball around off. Nudged to point
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, punched off the back-foot to backward point

commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no runlength ball around off. Gaikwad tries to poke at it. He's lucky that didn't take an edge to Wade
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Gaikwad, no run, nicely bowled, Behrendorff shortens the length and angles one across the right-hander, has Gaikwad feeling for it and beats him on the outside edge

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar,  SIX runsfull ball on leg. Suryakumar spots the line early, shuffles onto the off side, gets low, and then flicks it over fine leg again!
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, SIX, that's easy pickings and it's 13 off the over, leg-stump half-volley from Ellis - Suryakumar gets inside the line and then whips it over long leg for a maximum - the fielder at fine leg was a mere spectator as the ball soared into the 1st tier

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar, no rungood length ball around off stump. Hurries onto SKY. He drops his wrists and fends gently
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, Ellis shortens the length around off, defended to the off-side

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar, no runfullish ball driven to mid on.
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, fuller length delivery at the stumps, driven straight to the fielder at mid-on

commentary: Ellis to Suryakumar,  SIX runsfull on off stump. Moves to the off side slightly and then uses his wrists to gloriously flick it over fine leg! Oozes class. And the crowd comes alive!
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Suryakumar Yadav, SIX, cheeky and six - on a length and angling into the right-hander, Suryakumar gets down low, watches the ball all the way, used the pace on the ball and then paddled it over long leg for a maximum

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad,  1 runfull ball on middle. Flicked off his toes to deep backward square leg
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, 1 run, fuller length delivery on the pads, whipped over backward square leg for a single

commentary: Ellis to Gaikwad, no runfull ball on middle stump and driven to mid off
second_commentary: Nathan Ellis to Gaikwad, no run, fuller length delivery on off, Gaikwad prods forward and defends it to mid-off

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no rungood length ball on middle. Nudged to the off side
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, Behrendorff shortens the length and cramps Suryakumar for room on the cut, defended to the off-side

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no rungood length ball on middle. Tapped to the off side. Suryakumar nods as if to say that the ball bounced awkwardly
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, Suryakumar gets behind the line and defends it to the off-side

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no rungreat channel. Fullish ball around off and angling away a bit. Attempts a drive but the ball goes past the edge
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, lovely, on a good length and angling away from the right-hander - drags Suryakumar into the drive and whizzes past the outside edge

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no runfullish ball on middle and leg. Gently nudged to midwicket. He wants one but his partner turns it down. Guess that happens when a batter has been run-out for a diamond duck in the first T20I. Was a risky option anyway
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, on a good length and at the stumps, nudged in front of mid-wicket and Suryakumar wanted a single, sent back by his partner

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no rungood length ball just outside off. Tries to offer the full face of the bat in a punchy shot down the ground. Mistimed, and Jason collects on the followthrough
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, Behrendorff shortens the length on off, pushed back at the bowler who makes a half-stop on his followthrough

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no runlength ball outside off. Punchy shot to the off side
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, on a good length and just outside off, Suryakumar stays besides the line and pushes it to the off-side

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, no runlength ball outside off. Punchy shot to the off side
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, wide, loose delivery from Behrendorff, short and wayward, called as a wide

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, 1 widemore wide runs. This one slides across SKY with Behrendorff starting another over.
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, on a good length and just outside off, Suryakumar stays besides the line and pushes it to the off-side

commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar, 1 widemore wide runs. This one slides across SKY with Behrendorff starting another over.
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Suryakumar Yadav, wide, loose delivery from Behrendorff, short and wayward, called as a wide

commentary: Kane Richardson to Suryakumar,  1 runfull ball, awfully wide outside off. SKY reaches out and drills it to point, who gets a hand to it and stops a boundary
second_commentary: K Richardson to Suryakumar Yadav, 1 run, full and wide of off, would've been a wide had Suryakumar let it go, but he reached out on the drive and placed it to the right of point - the fielder diving and making a half-stop

commentary: Kane Richardson to Suryakumar, no runfull ball around off. Driven to mid on
second_commentary: K Richardson to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, fuller length delivery on off, Suryakumar leans across and finds mid-on with the drive

commentary: Kane Richardson to Suryakumar, no runcaught him on the back foot? LBW appeal - but turned down. Length ball just outside off but jagging in and hitting SKY on the back foot. Height a big issue there, and the right call from the umpire
second_commentary: K Richardson to Suryakumar Yadav, no run, half-an-appeal for LBW, but Suryakumar was hit high on the pad, the nip-backer and he was beaten on the inside edge as he shuffled across, struck high on the thigh-pad

commentary: Kane Richardson to Ishan, OUTslapped...straight to cover! Length ball around middle and angling across. Kishan confidently slaps the ball, but the extra bounce forces him to mis-hit. He failed to get on top of that shot, and its a soft dismissal inside the circle. Gone for a duck!Ishan Kishan c Stoinis b Richardson 0 (5b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 0
second_commentary: K Richardson to Ishan Kishan, out Caught by Stoinis!! Short and wide of off, and Ishan Kishan has slapped it straight into the hands of cover. - width on offer and Kishan saw the chance of getting runs, but there's some extra bounce and he's mistimed the back-foot drive badly, popped in the air and into the big hands of Stoinis, who doesn't miss out. Ishan Kishan c Stoinis b K Richardson 0(5)

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad,  1 runlength ball tucked off his pads to the leg side for a single
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, 1 run, short of a length and angling into the pads, tucked past square leg for a single

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, no runfull and wide ball. Gaikwad chases after it, mistiming a shot to the off side
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, no run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, Gaikwad reaches out on the drive and mistimes it back at the bowler

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, no runfull and wide ball. Gaikwad chases after it, mistiming a shot to the off side
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, 5 wides, Richardson is struggling to control this new ball, spills one well down leg and it swings away late, Wade can only parry it to the ropes with the dive

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, 5 widelate swing takes the ball down the leg side. Pitches it full on middle and leg but it shapes in even more, and Wade is on the floor after failing to catch the ball on the dive
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, no run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, Gaikwad reaches out on the drive and mistimes it back at the bowler

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, 5 widelate swing takes the ball down the leg side. Pitches it full on middle and leg but it shapes in even more, and Wade is on the floor after failing to catch the ball on the dive
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, 5 wides, Richardson is struggling to control this new ball, spills one well down leg and it swings away late, Wade can only parry it to the ropes with the dive

commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan, no runfull ball just outside off. Leans into a confident cover drive but intercepted inside the circle
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan Kishan, no run, fuller length delivery outside off, driven crisply and straight to the fielder at cover

commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan, no runlength ball just outside off. Kishan carefully punches to point
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan Kishan, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, steered straight to the fielder at backward point

commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan, 4 leg byesgood length ball on off and sliding into leg. Kishan tries to play a late glance, and the ball flicks his thigh-guard before rolling away for four
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan Kishan, leg byes, FOUR, too short and too straight from Behrendorff, on the pads and it beats Wade on the right, came off Kishan's pads as he looked to flick

commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan, no runlength ball knocked to the leg side
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Ishan Kishan, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, defended to the on-side

commentary: Behrendorff to Jaiswal, OUTJaiswal loses his shape, and Wade collects the edge! Length ball around off. Jaiswal gives Jason a charge and tries to hit him over cover. But he's awfully out of position, and Wade sharply moves to his left to do the rest after the ball kissed the bat.Yashasvi Jaiswal c †Wade b Behrendorff 6 (6b 1x4 0x6 8m) SR: 100See all photos
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Jaiswal, out Caught by Wade!! Edged and caught! Behrendorff strikes early once again, on a good length and shaping away from off, Jaiswal charges down the pitch, makes room and looks to flay it over cover, gets a thick edge and Wade does the rest, moving swiftly across to his left. JaiswaWade b Behrendorff 6(6) [4s-1]

commentary: Behrendorff to Jaiswal, no runshort of length ball just outside off. Left alone
second_commentary: Behrendorff to Jaiswal, no run, on a good length and slanting across the left-hander, left alone

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, FOUR runsno slip present - and that's going in Gaikwad's favour! Length ball on a fourth-stump line. Gaikwad pokes at it, and the ball takes a thick edge before Wade sees it fly past his right for four
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, FOUR, edged and four, that slip fielder would've gobbled it up with ease, but Wade can only look in agony as the ball raced away - short of a good length and holding its line outside off, Gaikwad has a poke at that and the ball finds the big edge

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal,  1 runshort of length again. Leg-stump line. Attempts the pull but checks the shot at the last moment, instead rolling his wrists over it. To deep backward square leg
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 run, back of a length and angling across the left-hander - Jaiswal swivels across and pulls it behind square on the on-side for a single

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, FOUR runsshort of length around leg and middle. Jaiswal hangs back and pulls in front of square. Along the carpet, between mid on and midwicket!
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, FOUR, cracking shot, tad too short from Richardson - Jaiswal picks the length early, swivels across and then hammers the pull wide of mid-on, no need to run for those

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, no runbetter line. Full around off and more controlled outswing. Jaiswal attempts the drive and it just whizzes past his outside edge.
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, no run, fuller length delivery and shaping away from wide of off, Jaiswal went chasing after that and missed

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, no runbetter line. Full around off and more controlled outswing. Jaiswal attempts the drive and it just whizzes past his outside edge.
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, wide, Richardson pushes one full and wide of off, well past the tramlines and is called as a wide

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, no runbetter line. Full around off and more controlled outswing. Jaiswal attempts the drive and it just whizzes past his outside edge.
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, 2 wides, Richardson attempts another inswinger as Gaikwad came down the pitch - but he spills it down leg and it swings away further - Wade diving to his left and amking a half-stop, saves some runs for his team

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 wideplay and miss. Full ball outside off inviting Jaiswal to free his arms. The ball swings away and misses the bat by quite the distance
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, no run, fuller length delivery and shaping away from wide of off, Jaiswal went chasing after that and missed

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 wideplay and miss. Full ball outside off inviting Jaiswal to free his arms. The ball swings away and misses the bat by quite the distance
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, wide, Richardson pushes one full and wide of off, well past the tramlines and is called as a wide

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 wideplay and miss. Full ball outside off inviting Jaiswal to free his arms. The ball swings away and misses the bat by quite the distance
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, 2 wides, Richardson attempts another inswinger as Gaikwad came down the pitch - but he spills it down leg and it swings away further - Wade diving to his left and amking a half-stop, saves some runs for his team

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, 2 widefull ball on middle but swinging down leg. Wade gets a fingertip to it while diving to his left. Slows the ball down
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, no run, fuller length delivery and shaping away from wide of off, Jaiswal went chasing after that and missed

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, 2 widefull ball on middle but swinging down leg. Wade gets a fingertip to it while diving to his left. Slows the ball down
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, wide, Richardson pushes one full and wide of off, well past the tramlines and is called as a wide

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, 2 widefull ball on middle but swinging down leg. Wade gets a fingertip to it while diving to his left. Slows the ball down
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, 2 wides, Richardson attempts another inswinger as Gaikwad came down the pitch - but he spills it down leg and it swings away further - Wade diving to his left and amking a half-stop, saves some runs for his team

commentary: Kane Richardson to Gaikwad, no runpast the inside edge. Full ball outside off. Gaikwad lunges forward to attempt a drive. The ball swings in sharply and he's lucky that didn't take an inside edge onto the stumps
second_commentary: K Richardson to Gaikwad, no run, the inswinger now, nips back in from a length outside off and beats Gaikwad on the loose waft, could've so easily caught the inside edge

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal,  1 runadjusts the line. Short of length around leg and sliding across to off. Guided to deep third for a single
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 run, Richardson shortens the length around off, dabbed down towards third man for a single

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal,  1 runadjusts the line. Short of length around leg and sliding across to off. Guided to deep third for a single
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, wide, on a good length and pushed across the left-hander, but it swirls past the tramlines and is called as a wide

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 widefull ball outside off and banana swing further away from Jaiswal. Left alone
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 run, Richardson shortens the length around off, dabbed down towards third man for a single

commentary: Kane Richardson to Jaiswal, 1 widefull ball outside off and banana swing further away from Jaiswal. Left alone
second_commentary: K Richardson to Jaiswal, wide, on a good length and pushed across the left-hander, but it swirls past the tramlines and is called as a wide
